--Run it from RetailCosmosDB Database

CREATE VIEW Products
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
             CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmoscompass;Database=RetailSalesDemoDB',
               OBJECT = 'Products',
               SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmoscompass'
) AS [Products]
